title: AREA3D: Active Reconstruction Agent with Unified Feed-Forward 3D Perception and Vision-Language Guidance
summary: Active 3D reconstruction enables an agent to autonomously select viewpoints to efficiently obtain accurate and complete scene geometry, rather than passively reconstructing scenes from pre-collected images. However, existing active reconstruction methods often rely on hand-crafted geometric heuristics, which can lead to redundant observations without substantially improving reconstruction quality. To address this limitation, we propose AREA3D, an active reconstruction agent that leverages feed-forward 3D reconstruction models and vision-language guidance. Our framework decouples view-uncertainty modeling from the underlying feed-forward reconstructor, enabling precise uncertainty estimation without expensive online optimization. In addition, an integrated vision-language model provides high-level semantic guidance, encouraging informative and diverse viewpoints beyond purely geometric cues. Extensive experiments on both scene-level and object-level benchmarks demonstrate that AREA3D achieves state-of-the-art reconstruction accuracy, particularly in the sparse-view regime. Code will be made available at: https://github.com/TianlingXu/AREA3D .

AI.tldr: AREA3D是一种主动式三维重建智能体，它结合了前馈三维重建模型和视觉-语言指导，以高效、准确地获取场景几何，解决了现有方法依赖手动几何启发式导致的冗余观测问题。
AI.motivation: 现有的主动式三维重建方法通常依赖手工设计的几何启发式，这可能导致冗余观测，且未能显著提高重建质量，因此需要一种更有效的方法来选择视点。
AI.method: 本研究提出了AREA3D框架。它将视点不确定性建模与底层前馈重建器解耦，从而实现精确的不确定性估计，无需昂贵的在线优化。此外，一个集成的视觉-语言模型提供了高级语义指导，鼓励选择超越纯几何线索的信息丰富且多样化的视点。
AI.result: 在场景级和对象级基准测试中，AREA3D均取得了最先进的重建精度，尤其是在稀疏视图条件下表现突出。
AI.conclusion: AREA3D通过结合精确的不确定性估计和语义指导，克服了现有主动重建方法的局限性，实现了更高效、更准确的三维场景重建。

title: Fine-Tuning BERT for Domain-Specific Question Answering: Toward Educational NLP Resources at University Scale
summary: Prior work on scientific question answering has largely emphasized chatbot-style systems, with limited exploration of fine-tuning foundation models for domain-specific reasoning. In this study, we developed a chatbot for the University of Limerick's Department of Electronic and Computer Engineering to provide course information to students. A custom dataset of 1,203 question-answer pairs in SQuAD format was constructed using the university book of modules, supplemented with manually and synthetically generated entries. We fine-tuned BERT (Devlin et al., 2019) using PyTorch and evaluated performance with Exact Match and F1 scores. Results show that even modest fine-tuning improves hypothesis framing and knowledge extraction, demonstrating the feasibility of adapting foundation models to educational domains. While domain-specific BERT variants such as BioBERT and SciBERT exist for biomedical and scientific literature, no foundation model has yet been tailored to university course materials. Our work addresses this gap by showing that fine-tuning BERT with academic QA pairs yields effective results, highlighting the potential to scale towards the first domain-specific QA model for universities and enabling autonomous educational knowledge systems.

AI.tldr: 本文通过构建定制数据集并微调BERT模型，成功开发了一个为利默里克大学电子与计算机工程系学生提供课程信息的问答聊天机器人，展示了基础模型在教育领域应用的潜力。
AI.motivation: 以往的科学问答研究主要侧重于聊天机器人系统，对基础模型在特定领域推理方面的微调探索有限。目前缺乏针对大学课程材料的领域特定基础模型，而现有BERT变体如BioBERT和SciBERT主要针对生物医学和科学文献。
AI.method: 研究开发了一个聊天机器人，构建了一个包含1,203个问题-答案对的定制数据集（SQuAD格式），数据来源于大学课程手册并辅以手动和合成生成。使用PyTorch微调了BERT模型，并采用精确匹配（Exact Match）和F1分数评估性能。
AI.result: 结果表明，即使是适度的微调也能显著改善假设构建和知识提取能力，证明了将基础模型应用于教育领域的可行性。
AI.conclusion: 通过学术问答对微调BERT能够取得有效结果，填补了大学课程材料领域特定问答模型的空白，并展示了构建可扩展的大学领域特定问答模型和自主教育知识系统的巨大潜力。

title: CATNUS: Coordinate-Aware Thalamic Nuclei Segmentation Using T1-Weighted MRI
summary: Accurate segmentation of thalamic nuclei from magnetic resonance images is important due to the distinct roles of these nuclei in overall brain function and to their differential involvement in neurological and psychiatric disorders. However, segmentation remains challenging given the small size of many nuclei, limited intrathalamic contrast and image resolution, and inter-subject anatomical variability. In this work, we present CATNUS (Coordinate-Aware Thalamic Nuclei Segmentation), segmenting 13 thalamic nuclei (or nuclear groups) using a 3D U-Net architecture enhanced with coordinate convolution layers, which provide more precise localization of both large and small nuclei. To support broad clinical applicability, we provide pre-trained model variants that can operate on quantitative T1 maps as well as on widely used magnetization-prepared rapid gradient echo (MPRAGE) and fast gray matter acquisition T1 inversion recovery (FGATIR) sequences. We benchmarked CATNUS against established methods, including FreeSurfer, THOMAS and HIPS-THOMAS, demonstrating improved segmentation accuracy and robust test-retest reliability across multiple nuclei. Furthermore, CATNUS demonstrated strong out-of-distribution generalization on traveling-subject datasets spanning multiple scanners, field strengths, and vendors, producing reliable and anatomically coherent segmentations across diverse acquisition conditions. Overall, CATNUS provides an accurate and generalizable solution for thalamic nuclei segmentation, with strong potential to facilitate large-scale neuroimaging studies and support real-world clinical assessment.

AI.tldr: CATNUS是一种基于3D U-Net并增强坐标卷积层的丘脑核分割方法，能精确分割13个丘脑核团，在多种MRI序列上表现出更高的准确性、可靠性和泛化能力。
AI.motivation: 丘脑核团在脑功能和神经精神疾病中扮演重要角色，但由于其体积小、对比度有限、图像分辨率低以及个体间解剖变异性大，准确分割极具挑战性。
AI.method: 本文提出了CATNUS（Coordinate-Aware Thalamic Nuclei Segmentation），采用3D U-Net架构并结合坐标卷积层，以实现对大小核团更精确的定位。该模型支持定量T1图以及广泛使用的MPRAGE和FGATIR序列，并提供预训练模型。
AI.result: CATNUS在分割准确性和测试-重测可靠性方面优于FreeSurfer、THOMAS和HIPS-THOMAS等现有方法。此外，它在跨扫描仪、场强和供应商的旅行受试者数据集上表现出强大的域外泛化能力，生成可靠且解剖学一致的分割结果。
AI.conclusion: CATNUS为丘脑核团分割提供了一个准确且具有良好泛化能力的解决方案，有望促进大规模神经影像学研究并支持实际临床评估。

title: Wake Vectoring for Efficient Morphing Flight
summary: Morphing aerial robots have the potential to transform autonomous flight, enabling navigation through cluttered environments, perching, and seamless transitions between aerial and terrestrial locomotion. Yet mid-flight reconfiguration presents a critical aerodynamic challenge: tilting propulsors to achieve shape change reduces vertical thrust, undermining stability and control authority. Here, we introduce a passive wake vectoring mechanism that recovers lost thrust during morphing. Integrated into a novel robotic system, Aerially Transforming Morphobot (ATMO), internal deflectors intercept and redirect rotor wake downward, passively steering airflow momentum that would otherwise be wasted. This electronics-free solution achieves up to a 40% recovery of vertical thrust in configurations where no useful thrust would otherwise be produced, substantially extending hover and maneuvering capabilities during transformation. Our findings highlight a new direction for morphing aerial robot design, where passive aerodynamic structures, inspired by thrust vectoring in rockets and aircraft, enable efficient, agile flight without added mechanical complexity.

AI.tldr: 变形飞行机器人面临空中变形时推力损失的问题。本文介绍了一种被动尾流矢量机制，通过内部导流板将旋翼尾流向下偏转，有效恢复了变形过程中损失的推力，显著提升了悬停和机动能力。
AI.motivation: 变形飞行机器人虽然在复杂环境导航、栖息和陆空转换方面潜力巨大，但空中重构时倾斜推进器会导致垂直推力减少，从而损害稳定性和控制能力，这是一个关键的空气动力学挑战。
AI.method: 引入了一种名为“空中变形机器人”（ATMO）的新型机器人系统，该系统集成了一个被动尾流矢量机制。内部导流板拦截并向下重新定向旋翼尾流，被动地引导气流动量，从而恢复损失的推力。这是一种无需电子设备的解决方案。
AI.result: 在原本无法产生有效推力的配置下，该机制实现了高达40%的垂直推力恢复，极大地扩展了变形过程中的悬停和机动能力。
AI.conclusion: 研究结果为变形飞行机器人设计开辟了新方向，即受火箭和飞机推力矢量启发，利用被动气动结构实现高效、敏捷飞行，而无需增加机械复杂性。

title: ARCAS: An Augmented Reality Collision Avoidance System with SLAM-Based Tracking for Enhancing VRU Safety
summary: Vulnerable road users (VRUs) face high collision risks in mixed traffic, yet most existing safety systems prioritize driver or vehicle assistance over direct VRU support. This paper presents ARCAS, a real-time augmented reality collision avoidance system that provides personalized spatial alerts to VRUs via wearable AR headsets. By fusing roadside 360-degree 3D LiDAR with SLAM-based headset tracking and an automatic 3D calibration procedure, ARCAS accurately overlays world-locked 3D bounding boxes and directional arrows onto approaching hazards in the user's passthrough view. The system also enables multi-headset coordination through shared world anchoring. Evaluated in real-world pedestrian interactions with e-scooters and vehicles (180 trials), ARCAS nearly doubled pedestrians' time-to-collision and increased counterparts' reaction margins by up to 4x compared to unaided-eye conditions. Results validate the feasibility and effectiveness of LiDAR-driven AR guidance and highlight the potential of wearable AR as a promising next-generation safety tool for urban mobility.

AI.tldr: 本文提出ARCAS，一个实时的增强现实防撞系统，通过可穿戴AR头显为脆弱道路使用者（VRU）提供个性化空间警报，融合路边激光雷达和头显追踪，显著提高了行人的碰撞预警时间和反应裕度。
AI.motivation: 脆弱道路使用者在混合交通中面临高碰撞风险，而现有安全系统主要优先考虑驾驶员或车辆辅助，而非直接支持脆弱道路使用者。
AI.method: ARCAS系统融合了路边360度3D激光雷达数据、基于SLAM的头显追踪技术以及自动3D校准程序。它通过AR头显在用户的透视视图中精确叠加世界锁定的3D边界框和方向箭头来警示接近的危险。系统还通过共享世界锚定实现多头显协调。
AI.result: 在与电动滑板车和车辆的真实世界行人互动评估中（180次试验），ARCAS使行人的碰撞时间几乎翻倍，并将对方的反应裕度提高了四倍，远优于无辅助条件。结果验证了激光雷达驱动的AR指导的可行性和有效性。
AI.conclusion: 激光雷达驱动的AR指导是可行且有效的，可穿戴AR作为城市出行的新一代安全工具具有巨大潜力。

title: Documenting SME Processes with Conversational AI: From Tacit Knowledge to BPMN
comment: Presented at 2025 International Workshop on Low-Cost Digital Solutions for Industrial Automation (LODISA)
summary: Small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) still depend heavily on tacit, experience-based know-how that rarely makes its way into formal documentation. This paper introduces a large-language-model (LLM)-driven conversational assistant that captures such knowledge on the shop floor and converts it incrementally and interactively into standards-compliant Business Process Model and Notation (BPMN) 2.0 diagrams. Powered by Gemini 2.5 Pro and delivered through a lightweight Gradio front-end with client-side bpmn-js visualisation, the assistant conducts an interview-style dialogue: it elicits process details, supports clarifying dialogue and on-demand analysis, and renders live diagrams that users can refine in real time. A proof-of-concept evaluation in an equipment-maintenance scenario shows that the chatbot produced an accurate "AS-IS" model, flagged issues via on-diagram annotations, and generated an improved "TO-BE" variant, all within about 12-minutes, while keeping API costs within an SME-friendly budget. The study analyses latency sources, model-selection trade-offs, and the challenges of enforcing strict XML schemas, then outlines a roadmap toward agentic and multimodal deployments. The results demonstrate that conversational LLMs can potentially be used to lower the skill and cost barriers to rigorous process documentation, helping SMEs preserve institutional knowledge, enhance operational transparency, and accelerate continuous-improvement efforts.

AI.tldr: 本文提出一个由大型语言模型驱动的对话式助手，旨在帮助中小型企业（SMEs）将车间中基于经验的隐性知识，通过交互式对话捕获并转化为符合BPMN 2.0标准的业务流程图。
AI.motivation: 中小型企业严重依赖难以被正式记录的隐性、经验性知识。这种知识的缺乏正式文档化阻碍了机构知识的保存、运营透明度的提升以及持续改进的加速。
AI.method: 研究开发了一个由Gemini 2.5 Pro驱动的对话式助手，通过轻量级Gradio前端和客户端bpmn-js可视化工具实现。该助手通过访谈式对话，逐步且交互式地获取流程细节，支持澄清和按需分析，并实时渲染可供用户修改的BPMN 2.0图表。
AI.result: 在一个设备维护场景的概念验证评估中，该聊天机器人成功在约12分钟内生成了准确的“现状”（AS-IS）模型，通过图表注释标记了问题，并生成了改进的“目标”（TO-BE）变体，同时API成本维持在中小企业可承受的预算内。研究还分析了延迟来源、模型选择权衡以及强制执行严格XML模式的挑战。
AI.conclusion: 结果表明，对话式大型语言模型有望降低严格流程文档化的技能和成本障碍，从而帮助中小型企业保存机构知识，提高运营透明度，并加速持续改进工作。

title: Image Semantic Communication with Quadtree Partition-based Coding
summary: Deep learning based semantic communication (DeepSC) system has emerged as a promising paradigm for efficient wireless transmission. However, existing image DeepSC methods, frequently encounter challenges in balancing rate-distortion performance and computational complexity, and often exhibit inferior performance compared to traditional schemes, especially on high-resolution datasets. To address these limitations, we propose a novel image DeepSC system, using quadtree partition-based joint semantic-channel coding, named Quad-DeepSC, which maintains low complexity while achieving state-of-the-art transmission performance. Based on maturing learned image compression technologies, we establish a unified DeepSC system design and training pipeline. The proposed Quad-DeepSC integrates quadtree partition-based entropy estimation and feature coding modules with lightweight feature extraction and reconstruction networks to form an end-to-end architecture. During training, all components except the feature coding modules are jointly optimized as a compact learned image codec, Quad-LIC, for source compression tasks. The pretrained Quad-LIC is then embedded into Quad-DeepSC and fine-tuned end-to-end over wireless channels. Extensive experimental results demonstrate that Quad-DeepSC is the first DeepSC system to surpass conventional communication systems, which employ VTM for source coding and adopt the optimal MCS index under 3GPP standards for channel coding and digital modulation, in performance across datasets of varying resolutions. Notably, both Quad-DeepSC and Quad-LIC exhibit minimal latency, rendering them well-suited for deployment in real-time wireless communication systems.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为Quad-DeepSC的图像深度语义通信系统，它采用四叉树划分的联合语义-信道编码，在保持低复杂度的同时，首次在不同分辨率数据集上超越了传统通信系统，并实现了最先进的传输性能。
AI.motivation: 现有基于深度学习的图像语义通信（DeepSC）系统在平衡速率-失真性能和计算复杂度方面面临挑战，并且在处理高分辨率数据集时，其性能通常不如传统方案。
AI.method: 本文提出了一种新颖的图像DeepSC系统，名为Quad-DeepSC，它采用基于四叉树划分的联合语义-信道编码。该系统基于成熟的图像压缩技术，整合了基于四叉树划分的熵估计和特征编码模块，以及轻量级的特征提取和重建网络，形成端到端架构。在训练过程中，除了特征编码模块外，所有组件作为紧凑的学习图像编解码器Quad-LIC进行联合优化以完成源压缩任务。预训练的Quad-LIC随后嵌入到Quad-DeepSC中，并在无线信道上进行端到端微调。
AI.result: 实验结果表明，Quad-DeepSC是第一个在不同分辨率数据集上性能超越传统通信系统（使用VTM进行源编码，并采用3GPP标准下最优MCS索引进行信道编码和数字调制）的DeepSC系统。此外，Quad-DeepSC和Quad-LIC都表现出极低的延迟。
AI.conclusion: Quad-DeepSC系统在图像语义通信方面取得了突破性进展，它以低复杂度和低延迟实现了超越传统通信系统的最先进性能，非常适合部署在实时无线通信系统中。

title: Unveiling Affective Polarization Trends in Parliamentary Proceedings
summary: Recent years have seen an increase in polarized discourse worldwide, on various platforms. We propose a novel method for quantifying polarization, based on the emotional style of the discourse rather than on differences in ideological stands. Using measures of Valence, Arousal and Dominance, we detect signals of emotional discourse and use them to operationalize the concept of affective polarization. Applying this method to a recently released corpus of proceedings of the Knesset, the Israeli parliament (in Hebrew), we find that the emotional style of members of government differs from that of opposition members; and that the level of affective polarization, as reflected by this style, is significantly increasing with time.

AI.tldr: 本文提出一种基于情感风格而非意识形态差异的新方法来量化政治极化，并在以色列议会语料库中发现政府和反对党成员的情感风格存在差异，且情感极化程度随时间显著增加。
AI.motivation: 近年来全球范围内极化言论日益增多，需要一种新颖的方法来量化极化，超越传统的意识形态立场差异，转而关注言论的情感风格。
AI.method: 本文提出一种基于情感风格（通过效价、唤醒度和主导度VAD测量）来量化极化的新方法。该方法通过检测情感言论信号来操作化“情感极化”概念。研究将此方法应用于最近发布的以色列议会（Knesset）会议记录语料库。
AI.result: 研究发现，政府成员的情感风格与反对党成员的不同。此外，通过这种情感风格反映出的情感极化水平随时间显著增加。
AI.conclusion: 情感风格可以作为量化情感极化的有效指标，且在以色列议会中观察到情感极化程度呈上升趋势。

title: General and Domain-Specific Zero-shot Detection of Generated Images via Conditional Likelihood
summary: The rapid advancement of generative models, particularly diffusion-based methods, has significantly improved the realism of synthetic images. As new generative models continuously emerge, detecting generated images remains a critical challenge. While fully supervised, and few-shot methods have been proposed, maintaining an updated dataset is time-consuming and challenging. Consequently, zero-shot methods have gained increasing attention in recent years. We find that existing zero-shot methods often struggle to adapt to specific image domains, such as artistic images, limiting their real-world applicability. In this work, we introduce CLIDE, a novel zero-shot detection method based on conditional likelihood approximation. Our approach computes likelihoods conditioned on real images, enabling adaptation across diverse image domains. We extensively evaluate CLIDE, demonstrating state-of-the-art performance on a large-scale general dataset and significantly outperform existing methods in domain-specific cases. These results demonstrate the robustness of our method and underscore the need of broad, domain-aware generalization for the AI-generated image detection task. Code is available at https://github.com/FujitsuResearch/domain_adaptive_image_detection.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为CLIDE的新型零样本检测方法，通过条件似然近似，能够有效检测AI生成图像，并在不同图像领域（特别是特定领域如艺术图像）展现出强大的适应性和卓越性能。
AI.motivation: 随着生成模型（尤其是扩散模型）的快速发展，检测AI生成图像成为一项关键挑战。现有全监督和少样本方法需要耗时的数据集更新，而零样本方法则难以适应特定图像领域（如艺术图像），限制了其实际应用。
AI.method: 本文引入了CLIDE，一种基于条件似然近似的新型零样本检测方法。该方法通过计算以真实图像为条件的似然，实现了在不同图像领域间的适应性。
AI.result: CLIDE在大型通用数据集上取得了最先进的性能，并在特定领域案例中显著优于现有方法。这些结果证明了该方法的鲁棒性。
AI.conclusion: CLIDE方法具有强大的鲁棒性，并强调了AI生成图像检测任务中广泛的、领域感知的泛化能力的重要性。

title: Search at Scale: Improving Numerical Conditioning of Ergodic Coverage Optimization for Multi-Scale Domains
summary: Recent methods in ergodic coverage planning have shown promise as tools that can adapt to a wide range of geometric coverage problems with general constraints, but are highly sensitive to the numerical scaling of the problem space. The underlying challenge is that the optimization formulation becomes brittle and numerically unstable with changing scales, especially under potentially nonlinear constraints that impose dynamic restrictions, due to the kernel-based formulation. This paper proposes to address this problem via the development of a scale-agnostic and adaptive ergodic coverage optimization method based on the maximum mean discrepancy metric (MMD). Our approach allows the optimizer to solve for the scale of differential constraints while annealing the hyperparameters to best suit the problem domain and ensure physical consistency. We also derive a variation of the ergodic metric in the log space, providing additional numerical conditioning without loss of performance. We compare our approach with existing coverage planning methods and demonstrate the utility of our approach on a wide range of coverage problems.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于最大均值差异（MMD）度量的、与尺度无关的自适应遍历覆盖优化方法，以解决现有方法在数值尺度敏感性和非线性约束下的不稳定性问题。
AI.motivation: 现有的遍历覆盖规划方法对问题空间的数值尺度高度敏感，且在非线性约束下，由于基于核的公式，优化变得脆弱且数值不稳定。
AI.method: 本文通过开发一种基于最大均值差异（MMD）度量的、与尺度无关的自适应遍历覆盖优化方法来解决此问题。该方法允许优化器求解微分约束的尺度，同时退火超参数以适应问题域并确保物理一致性。此外，还推导了遍历度量在对数空间中的变体，以提供额外的数值条件性而不损失性能。
AI.result: 所提出的方法能够确保物理一致性，并通过对数空间度量提供额外的数值条件性，同时不损失性能。与现有覆盖规划方法相比，该方法在广泛的覆盖问题上展示了其效用。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的基于MMD的、与尺度无关的自适应遍历覆盖优化方法有效解决了现有方法的数值不稳定性问题，提高了其在各种覆盖问题中的鲁棒性和适用性。

title: Semantic Faithfulness and Entropy Production Measures to Tame Your LLM Demons and Manage Hallucinations
summary: Evaluating faithfulness of Large Language Models (LLMs) to a given task is a complex challenge. We propose two new unsupervised metrics for faithfulness evaluation using insights from information theory and thermodynamics. Our approach treats an LLM as a bipartite information engine where hidden layers act as a Maxwell demon controlling transformations of context $C $ into answer $A$ via prompt $Q$. We model Question-Context-Answer (QCA) triplets as probability distributions over shared topics. Topic transformations from $C$ to $Q$ and $A$ are modeled as transition matrices ${\bf Q}$ and ${\bf A}$ encoding the query goal and actual result, respectively. Our semantic faithfulness (SF) metric quantifies faithfulness for any given QCA triplet by the Kullback-Leibler (KL) divergence between these matrices. Both matrices are inferred simultaneously via convex optimization of this KL divergence, and the final SF metric is obtained by mapping the minimal divergence onto the unit interval [0,1], where higher scores indicate greater faithfulness. Furthermore, we propose a thermodynamics-based semantic entropy production (SEP) metric in answer generation, and show that high faithfulness generally implies low entropy production. The SF and SEP metrics can be used jointly or separately for LLM evaluation and hallucination control. We demonstrate our framework on LLM summarization of corporate SEC 10-K filings.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了两种新的无监督指标（语义忠实度SF和语义熵产生SEP），利用信息论和热力学原理评估大型语言模型（LLM）的忠实度，并可用于幻觉控制。
AI.motivation: 评估大型语言模型（LLM）对给定任务的忠实度是一个复杂的挑战。
AI.method: 将LLM视为双向信息引擎，隐藏层充当麦克斯韦妖。将问题-上下文-答案（QCA）三元组建模为共享主题上的概率分布。上下文到问题（Q）和答案（A）的主题转换分别建模为转换矩阵Q和A。语义忠实度（SF）指标通过这些矩阵之间的Kullback-Leibler（KL）散度量化忠实度，并通过凸优化同时推断出两个矩阵，最终将最小散度映射到[0,1]区间。此外，提出了基于热力学的语义熵产生（SEP）指标来衡量答案生成过程。
AI.result: SF指标可以量化任何给定QCA三元组的忠实度，得分越高表示忠实度越高。高忠实度通常意味着低熵产生。SF和SEP指标可以联合或单独用于LLM评估和幻觉控制。该框架已在LLM对公司SEC 10-K文件的摘要任务中得到验证。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的语义忠实度（SF）和语义熵产生（SEP）指标是评估LLM忠实度和控制幻觉的有效无监督工具，可以单独或联合使用。

title: Two-Stage Camera Calibration Method for Multi-Camera Systems Using Scene Geometry
summary: Calibration of multi-camera systems is a key task for accurate object tracking. However, it remains a challenging problem in real-world conditions, where traditional methods are not applicable due to the lack of accurate floor plans, physical access to place calibration patterns, or synchronized video streams. This paper presents a novel two-stage calibration method that overcomes these limitations. In the first stage, partial calibration of individual cameras is performed based on an operator's annotation of natural geometric primitives (parallel, perpendicular, and vertical lines, or line segments of equal length). This allows estimating key parameters (roll, pitch, focal length) and projecting the camera's Effective Field of View (EFOV) onto the horizontal plane in a base 3D coordinate system. In the second stage, precise system calibration is achieved through interactive manipulation of the projected EFOV polygons. The operator adjusts their position, scale, and rotation to align them with the floor plan or, in its absence, using virtual calibration elements projected onto all cameras in the system. This determines the remaining extrinsic parameters (camera position and yaw). Calibration requires only a static image from each camera, eliminating the need for physical access or synchronized video. The method is implemented as a practical web service. Comparative analysis and demonstration videos confirm the method's applicability, accuracy, and flexibility, enabling the deployment of precise multi-camera tracking systems in scenarios previously considered infeasible.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种新颖的两阶段多摄像机系统校准方法，通过操作员标注自然几何原语和交互式调整投影视野，克服了传统方法在缺乏平面图、物理访问或同步视频等实际条件下的局限性。
AI.motivation: 多摄像机系统校准是精确目标跟踪的关键任务，但在缺乏精确平面图、无法放置校准图案或没有同步视频流的真实世界条件下，传统方法难以适用，这促使研究人员开发一种新的解决方案。
AI.method: 该方法分为两个阶段：第一阶段，操作员通过标注自然几何原语（平行线、垂直线、竖直线或等长线段）对单个摄像机进行部分校准，以估计俯仰角、滚转角和焦距，并将有效视场（EFOV）投影到水平面。第二阶段，操作员通过交互式操作投影的EFOV多边形（调整位置、缩放和旋转）来与平面图对齐或使用虚拟校准元素，从而实现精确的系统校准，确定摄像机位置和偏航角。该方法仅需每台摄像机的静态图像，无需物理访问或同步视频，并已实现为网络服务。
AI.result: 通过比较分析和演示视频，该方法被证实具有适用性、准确性和灵活性。它使得在以前被认为不可行的场景中部署精确的多摄像机跟踪系统成为可能。
AI.conclusion: 该研究提供了一种实用、准确且灵活的多摄像机校准方法，有效解决了在缺乏传统校准条件的复杂真实世界环境中进行多摄像机系统部署的挑战。

title: Data-Driven Adaptive Output Regulation of Unknown Linear Systems
summary: This paper investigates the linear output regulation problem with both the exosystem and the plant fully unknown. A data-driven regulator is proposed to achieve asymptotic regulation and closed-loop stability without performing model identification. The method constructs a nominal approximate internal model and filters of input and outputs, thereby yielding a stabilizable cascaded nominal system whose states are available. For this nominal system, a stabilizing law is derived from an offline dataset that has been acquired from the plant during experiments, such that the system states exponentially converge to a subspace. An identifier in discrete-time is, then, implemented to correct the internal model and update the stabilizing law; as a result, the regulation error can be steered to zero asymptotically under some persistent excitation conditions.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种数据驱动的调节器，用于解决外系统和被控对象均完全未知情况下的线性输出调节问题，无需模型辨识即可实现渐近调节和闭环稳定性。
AI.motivation: 传统方法通常需要模型辨识，而本文旨在解决外系统和被控对象完全未知时，如何实现线性输出调节，即在缺乏系统先验知识的情况下，使输出渐近跟踪参考信号并保持闭环稳定。
AI.method: 该方法构建了一个名义近似内模以及输入输出滤波器，从而得到一个可镇定的级联名义系统，其状态是可用的。利用离线实验数据集为该名义系统推导出一个镇定律，使系统状态指数收敛到一个子空间。随后，实现一个离散时间辨识器来修正内模并更新镇定律。
AI.result: 通过这种方法，在满足一定的持续激励条件下，系统能够实现渐近调节和闭环稳定性，调节误差可以渐近地趋于零。
AI.conclusion: 研究表明，即使在被控对象和外系统完全未知的情况下，通过数据驱动的方法，结合近似内模、滤波器、离线数据学习和在线辨识更新，也能够成功解决线性输出调节问题，实现渐近调节和闭环稳定，而无需进行显式的模型辨识。

title: Breaking Scale Anchoring: Frequency Representation Learning for Accurate High-Resolution Inference from Low-Resolution Training
summary: Zero-Shot Super-Resolution Spatiotemporal Forecasting requires a deep learning model to be trained on low-resolution data and deployed for inference on high-resolution. Existing studies consider maintaining similar error across different resolutions as indicative of successful multi-resolution generalization. However, deep learning models serving as alternatives to numerical solvers should reduce error as resolution increases. The fundamental limitation is, the upper bound of physical law frequencies that low-resolution data can represent is constrained by its Nyquist frequency, making it difficult for models to process signals containing unseen frequency components during high-resolution inference. This results in errors being anchored at low resolution, incorrectly interpreted as successful generalization. We define this fundamental phenomenon as a new problem distinct from existing issues: Scale Anchoring. Therefore, we propose architecture-agnostic Frequency Representation Learning. It alleviates Scale Anchoring through resolution-aligned frequency representations and spectral consistency training: on grids with higher Nyquist frequencies, the frequency response in high-frequency bands of FRL-enhanced variants is more stable. This allows errors to decrease with resolution and significantly outperform baselines within our task and resolution range, while incurring only modest computational overhead.

AI.tldr: 零样本超分辨率时空预测（ZSSRSF）存在“尺度锚定”问题，即模型在更高分辨率下误差无法降低。本文提出频率表示学习（FRL），通过对齐频率表示和频谱一致性训练，有效缓解了尺度锚定，使误差随分辨率增加而减少。
AI.motivation: 现有零样本超分辨率时空预测模型在从低分辨率训练到高分辨率推理时，误差并不会随分辨率提高而降低，这与作为数值求解器的深度学习模型的期望相悖。根本原因是低分辨率数据的奈奎斯特频率限制了模型处理高频信号的能力，导致误差被“锚定”在低分辨率水平，被错误地解释为成功的泛化。本文将此现象定义为“尺度锚定”问题。
AI.method: 提出与架构无关的“频率表示学习（FRL）”方法。该方法通过分辨率对齐的频率表示和频谱一致性训练来缓解尺度锚定问题。
AI.result: 在具有更高奈奎斯特频率的网格上，FRL增强变体在高频带中的频率响应更稳定。这使得误差能够随分辨率的增加而降低，并且在任务和分辨率范围内显著优于基线模型，同时只引入了适度的计算开销。
AI.conclusion: “尺度锚定”是零样本超分辨率时空预测中的一个基本问题。频率表示学习（FRL）通过使模型能够在分辨率增加时减少误差，有效解决了这一问题，展现了更好的多分辨率泛化能力。

title: Comparative Analysis of Barrier-like Function Methods for Reach-Avoid Verification in Stochastic Discrete-Time Systems
summary: In this paper, we compare several representative barrier-like conditions from the literature for infinite-horizon reach-avoid verification of stochastic discrete-time systems. Our comparison examines both their theoretical properties and computational tractability, highlighting each condition's strengths and limitations that affect applicability and conservativeness. Finally, we illustrate their practical performance through computational experiments using semidefinite programming (SDP) and counterexample-guided inductive synthesis (CEGIS).

AI.tldr: 本文比较了几种用于随机离散时间系统无限 horizon 避碰验证的代表性类障碍条件。
AI.motivation: 现有文献中存在多种用于随机离散时间系统无限 horizon 避碰验证的类障碍条件，但对其理论特性、计算可行性、适用性及保守性的全面比较和评估尚不明确。
AI.method: 本文比较了几种代表性的类障碍条件，分析了它们的理论性质和计算可行性，并通过使用半定规划 (SDP) 和反例引导归纳综合 (CEGIS) 的计算实验来展示其实际性能。
AI.result: 研究揭示了每种条件的优点和局限性，这些特点影响了它们的适用性和保守性，并通过计算实验说明了它们的实际性能。
AI.conclusion: 通过对多种类障碍条件的理论和计算性能进行比较，本文突出了它们在随机离散时间系统避碰验证中的优势和不足，为选择合适的验证方法提供了依据。

title: Hybrid modeling approach for better identification of building thermal network model and improved prediction
summary: The gray-box modeling approach, which uses a semi-physical thermal network model, has been widely used in building prediction applications, such as model predictive control (MPC). However, unmeasured disturbances, such as occupants, lighting, and in/exfiltration loads, make it challenging to apply this approach to practical buildings. In this study, we propose a hybrid modeling approach that integrates the gray-box model with a model for unmeasured disturbance. After reviewing several system identification approaches, we systematically designed the unmeasured disturbance model with a model selection process based on statistical tests to make it robust. We generated data based on the building model calibrated by real operational data and then trained the hybrid model for two different weather conditions. The Hybrid model approach demonstrates the reduction of RMSE approximately 0.2-0.9C and 0.3-2C on 1-day ahead temperature prediction compared to the Conventional approach for mild (Berkeley, CA) and cold (Chicago, IL) climates, respectively. In addition, this approach was applied for experimental data obtained from the laboratory building to be used for the MPC application, showing superior prediction performances.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种混合建模方法，将灰箱模型与针对未测量扰动（如人员、照明）的模型相结合，通过统计测试进行模型选择，显著提高了建筑温度预测的准确性，适用于不同气候条件和模型预测控制（MPC）应用。
AI.motivation: 灰箱模型在建筑预测应用（如MPC）中广泛使用，但其在实际建筑中面临未测量扰动（如人员、照明、渗透负荷）的挑战，难以实际应用。
AI.method: 本研究提出了一种混合建模方法，将灰箱模型与未测量扰动模型相结合。通过审查多种系统识别方法，并基于统计测试进行模型选择，系统地设计了鲁棒的未测量扰动模型。使用真实运行数据校准的建筑模型生成数据，并针对两种不同天气条件（温和和寒冷气候）训练了混合模型。此外，该方法还应用于实验室建筑的实验数据，以用于MPC应用。
AI.result: 与传统方法相比，混合模型在提前1天的温度预测中显著降低了RMSE。在温和气候（加利福尼亚州伯克利）下，RMSE降低了约0.2-0.9°C；在寒冷气候（伊利诺伊州芝加哥）下，RMSE降低了约0.3-2°C。此外，该方法在实验室建筑的实验数据上显示出卓越的预测性能，适用于MPC应用。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的混合建模方法通过集成灰箱模型与鲁棒的未测量扰动模型，有效解决了实际建筑中未测量扰动带来的挑战，显著提高了建筑温度预测的准确性，并证明了其在不同气候条件和模型预测控制应用中的优越性。

title: Invariance Co-training for Robot Visual Generalization
summary: Reasoning from diverse observations is a fundamental capability for generalist robot policies to operate in a wide range of environments. Despite recent advancements, many large-scale robotic policies still remain sensitive to key sources of observational variation such as changes in camera perspective, lighting, and the presence of distractor objects. We posit that the limited generalizability of these models arises from the substantial diversity required to robustly cover these quasistatic axes, coupled with the current scarcity of large-scale robotic datasets that exhibit rich variation across them. In this work, we propose to systematically examine what robots need to generalize across these challenging axes by introducing two key auxiliary tasks, state similarity and invariance to observational perturbations, applied to both demonstration data and static visual data. We then show that via these auxiliary tasks, leveraging both more-expensive robotic demonstration data and less-expensive, visually rich synthetic images generated from non-physics-based simulation (for example, Unreal Engine) can lead to substantial increases in generalization to unseen camera viewpoints, lighting configurations, and distractor conditions. Our results demonstrate that co-training on this diverse data improves performance by 18 percent over existing generative augmentation methods. For more information and videos, please visit https://invariance-cotraining.github.io

AI.tldr: 为解决通用机器人策略对观测变化的泛化能力不足问题，本文提出两种辅助任务（状态相似性和观测扰动不变性），并结合机器人演示数据和非物理合成图像进行协同训练，显著提高了机器人对不同视角、光照和干扰物的泛化能力，性能提升18%。
AI.motivation: 现有大规模机器人策略对相机视角、光照和干扰物等观测变化敏感，泛化能力有限。这主要是因为缺乏具有足够多样性以覆盖这些准静态轴的大规模机器人数据集。
AI.method: 引入两个关键辅助任务：状态相似性（state similarity）和观测扰动不变性（invariance to observational perturbations）。将这些辅助任务应用于机器人演示数据和从非物理模拟（如虚幻引擎）生成的视觉丰富合成图像。通过这些辅助任务，利用混合数据进行协同训练。
AI.result: 通过辅助任务和多样化数据（机器人演示数据和合成图像）的协同训练，显著提高了机器人对未见过的相机视角、光照配置和干扰物条件的泛化能力。性能比现有生成增强方法提高了18%。
AI.conclusion: 结合辅助任务和多样化数据（昂贵的机器人演示数据和廉价的合成视觉数据）进行协同训练，可以大幅提升通用机器人策略在复杂观测条件下的泛化能力。

title: Privacy-Preserving Fully Distributed Gaussian Process Regression
comment: Submitted to IEEE Transactions on Neural Networks and Learning Systems
summary: Although distributed Gaussian process regression (GPR) enables multiple agents with separate datasets to jointly learn a model of the target function, its collaborative nature poses risks of private data leakage. To address this, we propose a privacy-preserving fully distributed GPR protocol based on secure multi-party computation (SMPC) that preserves the confidentiality of each agent's local dataset. Building upon a secure distributed average consensus algorithm, the protocol guarantees that each agent's local model practically converges to the same global model that would be obtained by the standard distributed GPR. Further, we adopt the paradigm of simulation based security to provide formal privacy guarantees, and extend the proposed protocol to enable kernel hyperparameter optimization, which is critical yet often overlooked in the literature. Experimental results demonstrate the effectiveness and practical applicability of the proposed method.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于安全多方计算（SMPC）的隐私保护全分布式高斯过程回归（GPR）协议，解决了分布式GPR中的数据隐私泄露问题，并支持核超参数优化。
AI.motivation: 尽管分布式高斯过程回归（GPR）允许多个智能体协作学习目标函数模型，但其协作性质存在私有数据泄露的风险。研究旨在解决这一隐私问题。
AI.method: 本文提出了一种基于安全多方计算（SMPC）的隐私保护全分布式GPR协议。该协议建立在安全分布式平均共识算法之上，并采用基于仿真的安全性范式提供形式化的隐私保证。此外，该协议还扩展以支持核超参数优化。
AI.result: 该协议保证每个智能体的局部模型实际上收敛到与标准分布式GPR相同的全局模型。实验结果证明了所提方法的有效性和实际适用性，并提供了形式化的隐私保证。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的隐私保护全分布式GPR协议有效且实际可行，能够确保在分布式GPR中各智能体本地数据集的机密性，同时支持关键的核超参数优化。

title: Decoding the Black Box: Discerning AI Rhetorics About and Through Poetic Prompting
comment: Late-Breaking Paper accepted to IEEE SSCI 2025 NLP & Social Media Track as extended abstract and presented in Trondheim, Norway 17-20 March 2025 as Poster Presentation
summary: Prompt engineering has emerged as a useful way studying the algorithmic tendencies and biases of large language models. Meanwhile creatives and academics have leveraged LLMs to develop creative works and explore the boundaries of their writing capabilities through text generation and code. This study suggests that creative text prompting, specifically Poetry Prompt Patterns, may be a useful addition to the toolbox of the prompt engineer, and outlines the process by which this approach may be taken. Then, the paper uses poetic prompts to assess descriptions and evaluations of three models of a renowned poet and test the consequences of the willingness of models to adapt or rewrite original creative works for presumed audiences.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出诗歌提示模式（Poetry Prompt Patterns）作为提示工程的新工具，用于评估大型语言模型（LLMs）对著名诗人作品的描述、评价及其改编原创作品的意愿。
AI.motivation: 提示工程是研究LLMs算法倾向和偏见的重要方法，同时创意人员和学者利用LLMs进行创作。本研究旨在探索创意文本提示，特别是诗歌提示，能否作为提示工程师的新工具，以更深入地研究LLMs的创作能力和潜在偏见。
AI.method: 本研究提出并概述了“诗歌提示模式”这一创意文本提示方法。然后，利用诗意提示来评估LLMs对一位著名诗人三个模型的描述和评价，并测试模型改编或重写原创创意作品以适应假定受众的意愿所带来的影响。
AI.result: 论文概述了采用诗歌提示方法的流程，并利用诗意提示评估了LLMs对著名诗人模型的描述和评价能力，以及它们改编或重写原创创意作品的意愿及其后果。
AI.conclusion: 创意文本提示，特别是诗歌提示模式，可以作为提示工程工具箱的有效补充，有助于深入研究LLMs的算法倾向、偏见以及其在创作和改编方面的能力。

title: InvarDiff: Cross-Scale Invariance Caching for Accelerated Diffusion Models
comment: 8 pages main, 8 pages appendix, 16 figures, 5 tables. Code: https://github.com/zihaowu25/InvarDiff
summary: Diffusion models deliver high-fidelity synthesis but remain slow due to iterative sampling. We empirically observe there exists feature invariance in deterministic sampling, and present InvarDiff, a training-free acceleration method that exploits the relative temporal invariance across timestep-scale and layer-scale. From a few deterministic runs, we compute a per-timestep, per-layer, per-module binary cache plan matrix and use a re-sampling correction to avoid drift when consecutive caches occur. Using quantile-based change metrics, this matrix specifies which module at which step is reused rather than recomputed. The same invariance criterion is applied at the step scale to enable cross-timestep caching, deciding whether an entire step can reuse cached results. During inference, InvarDiff performs step-first and layer-wise caching guided by this matrix. When applied to DiT and FLUX, our approach reduces redundant compute while preserving fidelity. Experiments show that InvarDiff achieves $2$-$3\times$ end-to-end speed-ups with minimal impact on standard quality metrics. Qualitatively, we observe almost no degradation in visual quality compared with full computations.

AI.tldr: InvarDiff是一种无需训练的加速方法，通过利用确定性采样中跨时间步和层级的特征不变性，实现扩散模型2-3倍的端到端加速，同时保持高保真度。
AI.motivation: 扩散模型虽然能生成高保真图像，但由于迭代采样过程，推理速度较慢。
AI.method: InvarDiff通过少量确定性运行，观察到确定性采样中存在特征不变性。它计算一个逐时间步、逐层、逐模块的二进制缓存计划矩阵，并使用重采样校正来避免连续缓存时的漂移。该矩阵基于分位数变化指标，指定何时重用模块或整个时间步的缓存结果。在推理时，InvarDiff根据此矩阵进行先时间步后逐层的缓存。
AI.result: 在DiT和FLUX模型上，InvarDiff实现了2-3倍的端到端加速，对标准质量指标影响最小，并且在视觉质量上几乎没有退化。
AI.conclusion: InvarDiff通过利用扩散模型确定性采样中的特征不变性，有效减少了冗余计算，显著提升了推理速度，同时保持了生成图像的高质量。

title: XR-DT: Extended Reality-Enhanced Digital Twin for Agentic Mobile Robots
summary: As mobile robots increasingly operate alongside humans in shared workspaces, ensuring safe, efficient, and interpretable Human-Robot Interaction (HRI) has become a pressing challenge. While substantial progress has been devoted to human behavior prediction, limited attention has been paid to how humans perceive, interpret, and trust robots' inferences, impeding deployment in safety-critical and socially embedded environments. This paper presents XR-DT, an eXtended Reality-enhanced Digital Twin framework for agentic mobile robots, that bridges physical and virtual spaces to enable bi-directional understanding between humans and robots. Our hierarchical XR-DT architecture integrates virtual-, augmented-, and mixed-reality layers, fusing real-time sensor data, simulated environments in the Unity game engine, and human feedback captured through wearable AR devices. Within this framework, we design an agentic mobile robot system with a unified diffusion policy for context-aware task adaptation. We further propose a chain-of-thought prompting mechanism that allows multimodal large language models to reason over human instructions and environmental context, while leveraging an AutoGen-based multi-agent coordination layer to enhance robustness and collaboration in dynamic tasks. Initial experimental results demonstrate accurate human and robot trajectory prediction, validating the XR-DT framework's effectiveness in HRI tasks. By embedding human intention, environmental dynamics, and robot cognition into the XR-DT framework, our system enables interpretable, trustworthy, and adaptive HRI.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了XR-DT，一个基于扩展现实的数字孪生框架，旨在通过融合物理与虚拟空间，提升移动机器人与人类之间双向理解，实现可解释、可信赖和自适应的人机交互。
AI.motivation: 随着移动机器人在共享空间中与人类协作日益增多，确保安全、高效和可解释的人机交互（HRI）成为紧迫挑战。现有研究多关注人类行为预测，但对人类如何感知、解释和信任机器人推断关注不足，这阻碍了机器人在安全关键和社会嵌入环境中的部署。
AI.method: XR-DT框架是一个分层架构，整合了虚拟现实、增强现实和混合现实层，融合实时传感器数据、Unity游戏引擎中的模拟环境以及通过可穿戴AR设备捕获的人类反馈。在该框架内，设计了一个具有统一扩散策略的智能移动机器人系统，用于上下文感知的任务适应。此外，提出了一种思维链提示机制，使多模态大语言模型能对人类指令和环境上下文进行推理，并利用基于AutoGen的多智能体协调层来增强动态任务的鲁棒性和协作性。
AI.result: 初步实验结果表明，该框架能准确预测人类和机器人的轨迹，验证了XR-DT框架在人机交互任务中的有效性。
AI.conclusion: 通过将人类意图、环境动态和机器人认知嵌入XR-DT框架，该系统能够实现可解释、可信赖和自适应的人机交互。

title: Enhancing Clinical Note Generation with ICD-10, Clinical Ontology Knowledge Graphs, and Chain-of-Thought Prompting Using GPT-4
summary: In the past decade a surge in the amount of electronic health record (EHR) data in the United States, attributed to a favorable policy environment created by the Health Information Technology for Economic and Clinical Health (HITECH) Act of 2009 and the 21st Century Cures Act of 2016. Clinical notes for patients' assessments, diagnoses, and treatments are captured in these EHRs in free-form text by physicians, who spend a considerable amount of time entering and editing them. Manually writing clinical notes takes a considerable amount of a doctor's valuable time, increasing the patient's waiting time and possibly delaying diagnoses. Large language models (LLMs) possess the ability to generate news articles that closely resemble human-written ones. We investigate the usage of Chain-of-Thought (CoT) prompt engineering to improve the LLM's response in clinical note generation. In our prompts, we use as input International Classification of Diseases (ICD) codes and basic patient information. We investigate a strategy that combines the traditional CoT with semantic search results to improve the quality of generated clinical notes. Additionally, we infuse a knowledge graph (KG) built from clinical ontology to further enrich the domain-specific knowledge of generated clinical notes. We test our prompting technique on six clinical cases from the CodiEsp test dataset using GPT-4 and our results show that it outperformed the clinical notes generated by standard one-shot prompts.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了如何通过结合思维链（CoT）提示工程、语义搜索和知识图谱来改进大型语言模型（LLM）生成的临床笔记，使用ICD编码和患者信息作为输入，结果显示优于标准一次性提示。
AI.motivation: 美国电子健康记录（EHR）数据激增，但医生手动书写和编辑临床笔记耗时巨大，增加了患者等待时间并可能延误诊断。大型语言模型（LLM）具备生成类人文本的能力，因此研究如何利用LLM辅助生成临床笔记以减轻医生负担。
AI.method: 研究采用思维链（CoT）提示工程来改进LLM（GPT-4）在临床笔记生成方面的响应。输入包括国际疾病分类（ICD）编码和基本患者信息。具体策略包括：1) 将传统CoT与语义搜索结果相结合；2) 融入基于临床本体论构建的知识图谱（KG），以丰富领域特定知识。在CodiEsp测试数据集的六个临床病例上测试了该提示技术。
AI.result: 研究结果表明，所提出的提示技术在生成临床笔记方面优于标准的一次性提示方法。
AI.conclusion: 结合思维链（CoT）提示、语义搜索结果和知识图谱可以显著提高大型语言模型（LLM）生成临床笔记的质量，为减轻医生工作负担和提高医疗效率提供了有效途径。

title: Bridging Traditional Machine Learning and Large Language Models: A Two-Part Course Design for Modern AI Education
comment: Accepted by the 39th annual Consortium for Computing Sciences in Colleges (CCSC:SE)
summary: This paper presents an innovative pedagogical approach for teaching artificial intelligence and data science that systematically bridges traditional machine learning techniques with modern Large Language Models (LLMs). We describe a course structured in two sequential and complementary parts: foundational machine learning concepts and contemporary LLM applications. This design enables students to develop a comprehensive understanding of AI evolution while building practical skills with both established and cutting-edge technologies. We detail the course architecture, implementation strategies, assessment methods, and learning outcomes from our summer course delivery spanning two seven-week terms. Our findings demonstrate that this integrated approach enhances student comprehension of the AI landscape and better prepares them for industry demands in the rapidly evolving field of artificial intelligence.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种创新的教学方法，系统地将传统机器学习技术与现代大型语言模型（LLMs）相结合，用于人工智能和数据科学教学。
AI.motivation: 研究旨在帮助学生全面理解人工智能的演进，并培养他们使用现有和前沿技术的实践技能，以满足行业对快速发展的人工智能领域的需求。
AI.method: 该课程分为两个互补的部分：基础机器学习概念和当代LLM应用。论文详细描述了课程架构、实施策略、评估方法以及为期两个七周学期的夏季课程的学习成果。
AI.result: 研究结果表明，这种整合方法显著增强了学生对人工智能全貌的理解，并更好地为他们应对快速发展的人工智能领域的行业需求做好了准备。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的结合传统机器学习与现代LLM的教学方法是有效的，能够提升学生对AI的理解，并更好地为他们未来的职业生涯做好准备。

title: On the Computability of Artificial General Intelligence
summary: In recent years we observed rapid and significant advancements in artificial intelligence (A.I.). So much so that many wonder how close humanity is to developing an A.I. model that can achieve human level of intelligence, also known as artificial general intelligence (A.G.I.). In this work we look at this question and we attempt to define the upper bounds, not just of A.I., but rather of any machine-computable process (a.k.a. an algorithm). To answer this question however, one must first precisely define A.G.I. We borrow prior work's definition of A.G.I. [1] that best describes the sentiment of the term, as used by the leading developers of A.I. That is, the ability to be creative and innovate in some field of study in a way that unlocks new and previously unknown functional capabilities in that field. Based on this definition we draw new bounds on the limits of computation. We formally prove that no algorithm can demonstrate new functional capabilities that were not already present in the initial algorithm itself. Therefore, no algorithm (and thus no A.I. model) can be truly creative in any field of study, whether that is science, engineering, art, sports, etc. In contrast, A.I. models can demonstrate existing functional capabilities, as well as combinations and permutations of existing functional capabilities. We conclude this work by discussing the implications of this proof both as it regards to the future of A.I. development, as well as to what it means for the origins of human intelligence.

AI.tldr: 本文基于特定AGI定义，形式化证明任何算法（包括AI）都无法真正创造出自身初始算法中不存在的新功能，因此无法实现真正的创造力。
AI.motivation: 近年来人工智能的快速发展引发了对“人工通用智能”（AGI）何时能达到的疑问。研究旨在定义AI以及任何机器可计算过程的上限，并为此首先需要精确定义AGI。
AI.method: 借用先前对AGI的定义，即“在某个研究领域中以解锁该领域新的、以前未知的功能能力的方式进行创造和创新”。基于此定义，作者形式化证明了计算的极限。
AI.result: 研究正式证明，任何算法都无法展示其初始算法中未包含的新功能。因此，任何算法（包括AI模型）都无法在任何领域展现真正的创造力。AI模型只能展示现有功能，以及现有功能的组合和排列。
AI.conclusion: 该证明对未来AI发展以及人类智能的起源具有重要意义。AI无法实现真正的创造力，其能力限于现有功能的再组合和扩展。

title: Disturbance Compensation for Safe Kinematic Control of Robotic Systems with Closed Architecture
summary: In commercial robotic systems, it is common to encounter a closed inner-loop torque controller that is not user-modifiable. However, the outer-loop controller, which sends kinematic commands such as position or velocity for the inner-loop controller to track, is typically exposed to users. In this work, we focus on the development of an easily integrated add-on at the outer-loop layer by combining disturbance rejection control and robust control barrier function for high-performance tracking and safe control of the whole dynamic system of an industrial manipulator. This is particularly beneficial when 1) the inner-loop controller is imperfect, unmodifiable, and uncertain; and 2) the dynamic model exhibits significant uncertainty. Stability analysis, formal safety guarantee proof, and hardware experiments with a PUMA robotic manipulator are presented. Our solution demonstrates superior performance in terms of simplicity of implementation, robustness, tracking precision, and safety compared to the state of the art. Video: https://youtu.be/zw1tanvrV8Q

AI.tldr: 本文提出一种易于集成的外环附加控制器，结合扰动抑制控制和鲁棒控制屏障函数，用于提高商业机械臂的跟踪性能和安全性，即使面对不可修改的内环控制器和显著的动力学模型不确定性。
AI.motivation: 商业机器人系统中，内环力矩控制器通常是不可修改且不完善的，而外环控制器对用户开放。研究动机在于，当内环控制器存在缺陷、不可修改且不确定，以及动力学模型存在显著不确定性时，需要一种方法在外环层面提升整个动态系统的控制性能和安全性。
AI.method: 该研究在外环层开发了一个附加控制器，将扰动抑制控制（disturbance rejection control）与鲁棒控制屏障函数（robust control barrier function）相结合，以实现高性能跟踪和安全控制。方法包括稳定性分析、形式化安全保证证明以及硬件实验。
AI.result: 所提出的解决方案在实现简易性、鲁棒性、跟踪精度和安全性方面表现出优于现有技术的性能。通过稳定性分析、形式化安全保证证明和PUMA机械臂上的硬件实验验证了其有效性。
AI.conclusion: 该外环附加控制器成功地提升了工业机械臂的跟踪精度和安全性能，即使在内环控制器不完善、不可修改且不确定，以及动力学模型存在显著不确定性的复杂商业机器人系统中，也能实现高性能控制。

title: Solving Multiparametric Generalized Nash Equilibrium Problems and Explicit Game-Theoretic Model Predictive Control
summary: We present a method to compute explicit solutions of parametric Generalized Nash Equilibrium (GNE) problems with convex quadratic cost functions and linear coupling and local constraints. Assuming the parameters only enter the linear terms of the cost functions and constraint right-hand sides, we provide the exact multiparametric solution of the GNE problem. Such a solution enables (i) minimal real-time computation, (ii) inherent interpretability, explainability, and exact enumeration of all multiple equilibria, (iii) determine desired GNE solution types in the case of infinitely-many equilibria, and (iv) zero-shot updates of the GNE solution due to changes of constraint right-hand sides and/or linear costs. In line with explicit Model Predictive Control (MPC) approaches, we apply our method to solve game-theoretic MPC (Receding Horizon Games) explicitly, comparing performance against centralized solvers in a battery charging game and in a toy two-mass spring system control problem. A Python implementation of the algorithms presented in this paper is available on https://github.com/bemporad/nash_mpqp.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种计算参数化广义纳什均衡（GNE）问题的显式解的方法，该问题具有凸二次成本函数和线性约束，并将其应用于博弈论模型预测控制（MPC）。
AI.motivation: 解决参数化GNE问题在实时计算、可解释性、多重均衡枚举以及参数变化时零次更新等方面的挑战，特别是在博弈论MPC等应用中对高效和可预测解决方案的需求。
AI.method: 该方法针对具有凸二次成本函数、线性耦合和局部约束的参数化GNE问题，其中参数仅出现在成本函数的线性项和约束的右侧，提供精确的多参数化解。这类似于显式模型预测控制（MPC）的方法。
AI.result: 所提出的解决方案实现了最小的实时计算、固有的可解释性、可解释性和所有多重均衡的精确枚举，能够在存在无限多个均衡时确定所需的GNE解决方案类型，并允许因约束右侧和/或线性成本变化而进行零次更新。该方法被应用于显式解决博弈论MPC（循环视野博弈），并在电池充电博弈和双质量弹簧系统控制问题中与集中式求解器进行了性能比较，表现良好。
AI.conclusion: 该方法为参数化GNE问题提供了一种高效、显式的解决方案，具有显著的实时计算、分析和适应性优势，尤其适用于博弈论MPC等领域。

title: Fine-tuning an ECG Foundation Model to Predict Coronary CT Angiography Outcomes
summary: Coronary artery disease (CAD) remains a major global health burden. Accurate identification of the culprit vessel and assessment of stenosis severity are essential for guiding individualized therapy. Although coronary CT angiography (CCTA) is the first-line non-invasive modality for CAD diagnosis, its dependence on high-end equipment, radiation exposure, and strict patient cooperation limits large-scale use. With advances in artificial intelligence (AI) and the widespread availability of electrocardiography (ECG), AI-ECG offers a promising alternative for CAD screening. In this study, we developed an interpretable AI-ECG model to predict severe or complete stenosis of the four major coronary arteries on CCTA. On the internal validation set, the model's AUCs for the right coronary artery (RCA), left main coronary artery (LM), left anterior descending artery (LAD), and left circumflex artery (LCX) were 0.794, 0.818, 0.744, and 0.755, respectively; on the external validation set, the AUCs reached 0.749, 0.971, 0.667, and 0.727, respectively. Performance remained stable in a clinically normal-ECG subset, indicating robustness beyond overt ECG abnormalities. Subgroup analyses across demographic and acquisition-time strata further confirmed model stability. Risk stratification based on vessel-specific incidence thresholds showed consistent separation on calibration and cumulative event curves. Interpretability analyses revealed distinct waveform differences between high- and low-risk groups, highlighting key electrophysiological regions contributing to model decisions and offering new insights into the ECG correlates of coronary stenosis.

AI.tldr: 本研究开发了一种可解释的AI-ECG模型，用于预测冠状动脉（RCA, LM, LAD, LCX）的严重或完全狭窄，并在内部和外部验证集上表现出稳定的性能，为CAD筛查提供了一种有前景的替代方案。
AI.motivation: 冠状动脉疾病（CAD）是全球主要的健康负担。准确识别病变血管和评估狭窄严重程度对个体化治疗至关重要。虽然冠状动脉CT血管造影（CCTA）是诊断CAD的一线非侵入性方法，但其对高端设备、辐射暴露和严格患者配合的依赖限制了大规模应用。随着人工智能（AI）的进步和心电图（ECG）的广泛可用性，AI-ECG为CAD筛查提供了一个有前景的替代方案。
AI.method: 研究开发了一个可解释的AI-ECG模型，用于预测CCTA上四条主要冠状动脉（右冠状动脉、左主干、左前降支和左回旋支）的严重或完全狭窄。模型在内部和外部验证集上进行了性能评估，并对正常ECG子集、不同人口统计学和采集时间分层进行了稳定性分析。此外，还进行了基于血管特异性发病率阈值的风险分层和可解释性分析。
AI.result: 在内部验证集上，模型对RCA、LM、LAD和LCX的AUC分别为0.794、0.818、0.744和0.755；在外部验证集上，AUC分别达到0.749、0.971、0.667和0.727。在临床正常ECG子集中性能保持稳定，表明其对明显ECG异常之外的鲁棒性。跨人口统计学和采集时间分层的亚组分析进一步证实了模型的稳定性。基于血管特异性发病率阈值的风险分层在校准和累积事件曲线上显示出一致的分离。可解释性分析揭示了高风险组和低风险组之间独特的波形差异，突出了对模型决策有贡献的关键电生理区域。
AI.conclusion: 本研究开发的AI-ECG模型可以预测主要冠状动脉的严重或完全狭窄，在各种临床场景中表现出稳定且鲁棒的性能，即使在ECG正常的情况下也有效。该模型为CAD筛查提供了一个有前景的非侵入性替代方案，并为冠状动脉狭窄的ECG相关性提供了新的见解。

title: To Think or Not to Think: The Hidden Cost of Meta-Training with Excessive CoT Examples
summary: Chain-of-thought (CoT) prompting combined with few-shot in-context learning (ICL) has unlocked significant reasoning capabilities in large language models (LLMs). However, ICL with CoT examples is ineffective on novel tasks when the pre-training knowledge is insufficient. We study this problem in a controlled setting using the CoT-ICL Lab framework, and propose meta-training techniques to learn novel abstract reasoning tasks in-context. Although CoT examples facilitate reasoning, we noticed that their excessive inclusion during meta-training degrades performance when CoT supervision is limited. To mitigate such behavior, we propose CoT-Recipe, a formal approach to modulate the mix of CoT and non-CoT examples in meta-training sequences. We demonstrate that careful modulation via CoT-Recipe can increase the accuracy of transformers on novel tasks by up to 300% even when there are no CoT examples available in-context. We confirm the broader effectiveness of these techniques by applying them to pretrained LLMs (Qwen2.5 series) for symbolic reasoning tasks and observing gains of up to 130% in accuracy.

AI.tldr: CoT-ICL在LLM中对新任务表现不佳时，本文提出元训练技术和CoT-Recipe方法，通过调节元训练中CoT和非CoT示例的混合比例，显著提升模型在新颖抽象推理任务上的表现，即使上下文无CoT示例。
AI.motivation: 链式思考(CoT)提示结合少样本上下文学习(ICL)显著提升了大型语言模型(LLM)的推理能力。然而，当预训练知识不足时，带有CoT示例的ICL对新颖任务无效。本研究旨在解决LLM在上下文学习中学习新颖抽象推理任务的局限性。
AI.method: 研究在CoT-ICL Lab框架的受控设置下进行。提出了元训练技术，使模型能在上下文学习中学习新颖抽象推理任务。为解决CoT监督有限时过度包含CoT示例导致性能下降的问题，提出了CoT-Recipe，一种形式化方法来调节元训练序列中CoT和非CoT示例的混合比例。这些技术也应用于预训练的LLM（Qwen2.5系列）进行符号推理任务。
AI.result: CoT-Recipe通过仔细调节，即使上下文学习中没有CoT示例，也能将Transformer在新任务上的准确率提高高达300%。将这些技术应用于预训练LLM（Qwen2.5系列）进行符号推理任务时，观察到准确率提高高达130%。
AI.conclusion: CoT-Recipe通过在元训练中策略性地调节CoT和非CoT示例的混合，可以显著提高Transformer模型在上下文学习新颖抽象推理任务上的准确性，即使CoT监督有限或上下文无CoT示例，也展现出强大的有效性。

title: State-Conditional Adversarial Learning: An Off-Policy Visual Domain Transfer Method for End-to-End Imitation Learning
summary: We study visual domain transfer for end-to-end imitation learning in a realistic and challenging setting where target-domain data are strictly off-policy, expert-free, and scarce. We first provide a theoretical analysis showing that the target-domain imitation loss can be upper bounded by the source-domain loss plus a state-conditional latent KL divergence between source and target observation models. Guided by this result, we propose State- Conditional Adversarial Learning, an off-policy adversarial framework that aligns latent distributions conditioned on system state using a discriminator-based estimator of the conditional KL term. Experiments on visually diverse autonomous driving environments built on the BARC-CARLA simulator demonstrate that SCAL achieves robust transfer and strong sample efficiency.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为SCAL的条件对抗学习框架，用于在目标域数据稀缺、离策略且无专家示范的挑战性设置下，实现端到端模仿学习的视觉域迁移。
AI.motivation: 研究动机是为了解决视觉域迁移在端到端模仿学习中面临的实际挑战，即目标域数据严格离策略、无专家示范且稀缺。
AI.method: 首先，通过理论分析证明目标域模仿损失可以通过源域损失加上源域和目标域观测模型之间状态条件下的潜在KL散度进行上界估计。在此指导下，提出了状态条件对抗学习（SCAL），这是一个离策略的对抗框架，它利用基于判别器的条件KL项估计器，对系统状态条件下的潜在分布进行对齐。
AI.result: 在基于BARC-CARLA模拟器构建的视觉多样化自动驾驶环境中进行的实验表明，SCAL实现了鲁棒的迁移和强大的样本效率。
AI.conclusion: SCAL是一种在目标域数据受限的挑战性模仿学习场景中，实现视觉域迁移的有效且高效的方法。

title: Constructive boundary observer-based control of high-dimensional semilinear heat equations
summary: This paper presents a constructive finite-dimensional output-feedback design for semilinear $M$-dimensional ($M\geq 2$) heat equations with boundary actuation and sensing. A key challenge in high dimensions is the slower growth rate of the Laplacian eigenvalues. The novel features of our modal-decomposition-based design, which allows to enlarge Lipschitz constants, include a larger class of shape functions that may be distributed over a part of the boundary only, the corresponding lifting transformation and the full-order controller gain found from the design LMIs. We further analyze the robustness of the closed-loop system with respect to either multiplicative noise (vanishing at the origin) or additive noise (persistent). Effective LMI conditions are provided for specifying the minimal observer dimension and maximal Lipschitz constants that preserve the stability (mean-square exponential stability for multiplicative noise and noise-to-state stability for additive noise). Numerical examples for 2D and 3D cases demonstrate the efficacy and advantages of our method.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种针对半线性高维热方程的有限维输出反馈控制器设计方法，通过模态分解解决了拉普拉斯特征值增长慢的挑战，并分析了乘性噪声和加性噪声下的系统鲁棒性。
AI.motivation: 在高维（M≥2）半线性热方程中，拉普拉斯特征值的增长速度较慢，这给输出反馈控制器设计带来了挑战。研究旨在开发一种能够处理高维问题、允许更大Lipschitz常数、并对不同类型噪声具有鲁棒性的控制器。
AI.method: 该方法基于模态分解，引入了新颖的形状函数（可部分分布在边界上），并设计了相应的提升变换。控制器增益通过线性矩阵不等式（LMIs）确定。此外，还分析了闭环系统对乘性噪声（在原点消失）和加性噪声（持续存在）的鲁棒性。
AI.result: 研究提供了有效的LMI条件，用于确定最小观测器维度和最大Lipschitz常数，以保持稳定性（乘性噪声下的均方指数稳定性，加性噪声下的噪声-状态稳定性）。2D和3D数值示例证明了该方法的有效性和优势。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的有限维输出反馈设计方法成功地解决了高维半线性热方程的控制问题，通过模态分解、新型形状函数和LMI条件实现了对更大Lipschitz常数的支持，并对乘性噪声和加性噪声表现出良好的鲁棒性。

title: Exposing Pink Slime Journalism: Linguistic Signatures and Robust Detection Against LLM-Generated Threats
summary: The local news landscape, a vital source of reliable information for 28 million Americans, faces a growing threat from Pink Slime Journalism, a low-quality, auto-generated articles that mimic legitimate local reporting. Detecting these deceptive articles requires a fine-grained analysis of their linguistic, stylistic, and lexical characteristics. In this work, we conduct a comprehensive study to uncover the distinguishing patterns of Pink Slime content and propose detection strategies based on these insights. Beyond traditional generation methods, we highlight a new adversarial vector: modifications through large language models (LLMs). Our findings reveal that even consumer-accessible LLMs can significantly undermine existing detection systems, reducing their performance by up to 40% in F1-score. To counter this threat, we introduce a robust learning framework specifically designed to resist LLM-based adversarial attacks and adapt to the evolving landscape of automated pink slime journalism, and showed and improvement by up to 27%.

AI.tldr: 本地新闻面临“粉红粘液新闻”威胁，LLM修改文章显著降低现有检测系统性能。本文研究其特征，并提出一种能抵抗LLM攻击的鲁棒检测框架。
AI.motivation: 本地新闻是2800万美国人可靠信息来源，但正受到低质量、自动生成的“粉红粘液新闻”的威胁。检测这些欺骗性文章需要精细分析其语言、风格和词汇特征，特别是考虑到大型语言模型（LLMs）带来的新型对抗性修改。
AI.method: 本文对“粉红粘液新闻”的语言、风格和词汇特征进行全面研究，以发现其独特模式并提出检测策略。此外，针对LLM修改这一新的对抗性向量，本文引入了一个专门设计用于抵抗基于LLM的对抗性攻击并适应自动化“粉红粘液新闻”演变环境的鲁棒学习框架。
AI.result: 研究发现，即使是消费者可访问的LLM也能显著破坏现有检测系统，使其F1分数性能降低高达40%。为应对此威胁，本文提出的鲁棒学习框架将检测性能提高了高达27%。
AI.conclusion: “粉红粘液新闻”对本地新闻构成严重威胁，且LLM的引入使其检测更具挑战性。现有检测系统易受LLM修改攻击。本文提出的鲁棒学习框架能有效抵抗LLM攻击，为适应自动化“粉红粘液新闻”的演变提供了有效策略。

title: Resolving Zadehs Paradox Axiomatic Possibility Theory as a Foundation for Reliable Artificial Intelligence
summary: This work advances and substantiates the thesis that the resolution of this crisis lies in the domain of possibility theory, specifically in the axiomatic approach developed in Bychkovs article. Unlike numerous attempts to fix Dempster rule, this approach builds from scratch a logically consistent and mathematically rigorous foundation for working with uncertainty, using the dualistic apparatus of possibility and necessity measures. The aim of this work is to demonstrate that possibility theory is not merely an alternative, but provides a fundamental resolution to DST paradoxes. A comparative analysis of three paradigms will be conducted probabilistic, evidential, and possibilistic. Using a classic medical diagnostic dilemma as an example, it will be shown how possibility theory allows for correct processing of contradictory data, avoiding the logical traps of DST and bringing formal reasoning closer to the logic of natural intelligence.

AI.tldr: 本文提出并证实，可能性理论（特别是Bychkovs的公理化方法）是解决Dempster-Shafer理论（DST）悖论的根本方案，它为不确定性处理提供了逻辑一致且数学严谨的基础，而非仅仅修复DST规则。
AI.motivation: 解决DST在处理不确定性时面临的危机和悖论，并建立一个逻辑一致且数学严谨的不确定性处理基础。旨在证明可能性理论是DST悖论的根本解决方案，而非仅仅是一种替代方案。
AI.method: 采用可能性理论中的对偶机制（可能性测度与必要性测度）构建不确定性处理基础；对概率论、证据理论（DST）和可能性理论三种范式进行比较分析；使用经典的医学诊断困境作为案例进行演示。
AI.result: 可能性理论能够正确处理矛盾数据，避免DST的逻辑陷阱；它使形式推理更接近自然智能的逻辑；并最终证明了可能性理论为DST悖论提供了根本性解决方案。
AI.conclusion: 可能性理论，特别是Bychkovs的公理化方法，为解决DST悖论提供了一个根本且逻辑严谨的解决方案，能够有效处理矛盾数据，并使形式推理更符合自然智能的逻辑。

title: ChromouVQA: Benchmarking Vision-Language Models under Chromatic Camouflaged Images
summary: Vision-Language Models (VLMs) have advanced multimodal understanding, yet still struggle when targets are embedded in cluttered backgrounds requiring figure-ground segregation. To address this, we introduce ChromouVQA, a large-scale, multi-task benchmark based on Ishihara-style chromatic camouflaged images. We extend classic dot plates with multiple fill geometries and vary chromatic separation, density, size, occlusion, and rotation, recording full metadata for reproducibility. The benchmark covers nine vision-question-answering tasks, including recognition, counting, comparison, and spatial reasoning. Evaluations of humans and VLMs reveal large gaps, especially under subtle chromatic contrast or disruptive geometric fills. We also propose a model-agnostic contrastive recipe aligning silhouettes with their camouflaged renderings, improving recovery of global shapes. ChromouVQA provides a compact, controlled benchmark for reproducible evaluation and extension. Code and dataset are available at https://github.com/Chromou-VQA-Benchmark/Chromou-VQA.

AI.tldr: 视觉-语言模型（VLMs）在杂乱背景下的前景-背景分离方面表现不佳。本文引入了ChromouVQA，一个基于石原式色盲图的大规模多任务基准，以评估VLMs的这一能力。人类和VLMs的评估显示出巨大差距，尤其是在细微色差或干扰性几何填充下。研究还提出了一种模型无关的对比学习方法，以改善全局形状的恢复。
AI.motivation: 尽管视觉-语言模型（VLMs）在多模态理解方面取得了进展，但当目标嵌入在需要前景-背景分离的杂乱背景中时，它们仍然面临挑战。研究旨在解决VLM在色度伪装图像中进行前景-背景分割的困难，并为此提供一个可控、可复现的评估基准。
AI.method: 引入了ChromouVQA，一个大规模、多任务的基准，其图像基于石原式色度伪装图。该基准扩展了经典的圆点板，加入了多种填充几何形状，并改变了色度分离、密度、大小、遮挡和旋转等参数，同时记录了完整的元数据。ChromouVQA涵盖了九种视觉问答（VQA）任务，包括识别、计数、比较和空间推理。研究对人类和VLMs进行了评估，并提出了一种模型无关的对比学习方法，通过对齐轮廓与其伪装渲染图来改善全局形状的恢复。
AI.result: 人类和VLMs的评估结果显示出巨大的性能差距，尤其是在细微色度对比或干扰性几何填充的条件下。提出的模型无关的对比学习方法能够改善模型对全局形状的恢复能力。
AI.conclusion: ChromouVQA提供了一个紧凑、受控的基准，用于可复现地评估和扩展视觉-语言模型在前景-背景分离方面的能力。该基准揭示了当前VLM在此类任务上的局限性，并提出了一种潜在的改进方法。

title: AI & Human Co-Improvement for Safer Co-Superintelligence
summary: Self-improvement is a goal currently exciting the field of AI, but is fraught with danger, and may take time to fully achieve. We advocate that a more achievable and better goal for humanity is to maximize co-improvement: collaboration between human researchers and AIs to achieve co-superintelligence. That is, specifically targeting improving AI systems' ability to work with human researchers to conduct AI research together, from ideation to experimentation, in order to both accelerate AI research and to generally endow both AIs and humans with safer superintelligence through their symbiosis. Focusing on including human research improvement in the loop will both get us there faster, and more safely.

AI.tldr: 论文主张AI应追求“协同改进”（人机协作）而非“自我改进”，以期更快、更安全地实现协同超级智能。
AI.motivation: AI的自我改进充满危险且耗时，需要一种更安全、更可实现的路径来发展先进AI。
AI.method: 专注于提升AI系统与人类研究人员在AI研究（从构思到实验）全过程中的协作能力。
AI.result: 加速AI研究，并通过人机共生赋予AI和人类更安全的超级智能。
AI.conclusion: 最大化协同改进（人机协作）是比AI自我改进更好、更可实现的目标，能更快、更安全地发展超级智能。

title: Seabed-to-Sky Mapping of Maritime Environments with a Dual Orthogonal SONAR and LiDAR Sensor Suite
summary: Critical maritime infrastructure increasingly demands situational awareness both above and below the surface, yet existing ''seabed-to-sky'' mapping pipelines either rely on GNSS (vulnerable to shadowing/spoofing) or expensive bathymetric sonars. We present a unified, GNSS-independent mapping system that fuses LiDAR-IMU with a dual, orthogonally mounted Forward Looking Sonars (FLS) to generate consistent seabed-to-sky maps from an Autonomous Surface Vehicle. On the acoustic side, we extend orthogonal wide-aperture fusion to handle arbitrary inter-sonar translations (enabling heterogeneous, non-co-located models) and extract a leading edge from each FLS to form line-scans. On the mapping side, we modify LIO-SAM to ingest both stereo-derived 3D sonar points and leading-edge line-scans at and between keyframes via motion-interpolated poses, allowing sparse acoustic updates to contribute continuously to a single factor-graph map. We validate the system on real-world data from Belvederekanalen (Copenhagen), demonstrating real-time operation with approx. 2.65 Hz map updates and approx. 2.85 Hz odometry while producing a unified 3D model that spans air-water domains.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种独立的、不依赖GNSS的测绘系统，该系统融合了激光雷达-IMU和双正交前视声纳（FLS），可从自主水面车辆生成统一的“海底到天空”地图，并实现了实时操作。
AI.motivation: 关键海洋基础设施日益需要水上和水下态势感知能力，但现有“海底到天空”测绘管线要么依赖易受干扰/欺骗的GNSS，要么使用昂贵的测深声纳。
AI.method: 该系统融合了激光雷达-IMU和双正交安装的前视声纳（FLS），以实现GNSS独立的测绘。在声学方面，扩展了正交宽孔径融合以处理任意声纳间平移，并从每个FLS提取前沿形成线扫描。在测绘方面，修改了LIO-SAM，通过运动插值位姿在关键帧及之间摄取立体衍生的3D声纳点和前沿线扫描，使稀疏声学更新能持续贡献到一个单一的因子图地图中。
AI.result: 该系统在哥本哈根Belvederekanalen的真实世界数据上进行了验证，实现了实时操作，地图更新频率约为2.65 Hz，里程计频率约为2.85 Hz，并生成了一个跨越水面和水下区域的统一3D模型。
AI.conclusion: 该系统成功实现了从自主水面车辆进行实时的、统一的、不依赖GNSS的“海底到天空”测绘，有效解决了现有方法的局限性，为关键海洋基础设施提供了重要的态势感知能力。

title: PAC One-Step Safety Certification for Black-Box Discrete-Time Stochastic Systems
summary: This paper investigates the problem of safety certification for black-box discrete-time stochastic systems, where both the system dynamics and disturbance distributions are unknown, and only sampled data are available. Under such limited information, ensuring robust or classical quantitative safety over finite or infinite horizons is generally infeasible. To address this challenge, we propose a data-driven framework that provides theoretical one-step safety guarantees in the Probably Approximately Correct (PAC) sense. This one-step guarantee can be applied recursively at each time step, thereby yielding step-by-step safety assurances over extended horizons. Our approach formulates barrier certificate conditions based solely on sampled data and establishes PAC safety guarantees by leveraging the VC dimension, scenario approaches, Markov's inequality, and Hoeffding's inequality. Two sampling procedures are proposed, and three methods are proposed to derive PAC safety guarantees. The properties and comparative advantages of these three methods are thoroughly discussed. Finally, the effectiveness of the proposed methods are demonstrated through several numerical examples.

AI.tldr: 本文针对黑盒离散时间随机系统，提出了一种数据驱动的PAC（可能近似正确）意义上的一步安全认证框架。
AI.motivation: 当系统动力学和扰动分布未知，且仅有采样数据可用时，传统的鲁棒或定量安全认证在有限或无限时间范围内通常不可行。
AI.method: 提出一个数据驱动的框架，通过基于采样数据构建障碍证书条件，并利用VC维、场景方法、马尔可夫不等式和霍夫丁不等式来建立PAC安全保证。论文提出了两种采样程序和三种推导PAC安全保证的方法。
AI.result: 该方法提供理论上的一步PAC安全保证，并可递归应用于扩展的时间范围。文章详细讨论了所提出三种方法的特性和比较优势，并通过数值例子验证了其有效性。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的数据驱动方法能有效为信息有限的黑盒离散时间随机系统提供PAC意义上的安全认证。

title: LYNX: Learning Dynamic Exits for Confidence-Controlled Reasoning
summary: Large reasoning models achieve strong performance on complex tasks by generating extended chains of thought, but they often "overthink": continuing to reason long after they have enough information to answer correctly. This wastes inference-time compute and can hurt accuracy. Existing attempts to stop early either manipulate decoding with extra sampling and heuristics, rely on auxiliary verifier models, or operate only as post-hoc analysis pipelines without formal guarantees. We introduce LYNX, an online early-exit mechanism that turns a model's own hidden-state awareness into confidence-controlled stopping decisions. LYNX attaches exit decisions to naturally occurring reasoning cues (e.g., "hmm", "wait") during generation, trains a lightweight probe on hidden states at those cue tokens using supervision from forced exits, and wraps the resulting scores in split conformal prediction to obtain distribution-free control over premature exits. Crucially, we train and calibrate this probe once on a generic mathematical corpus and reuse it unchanged across benchmarks, decoding temperatures, and even non-mathematical tasks. Across three model families spanning 1.5B to 32B parameters, a single mathematically trained probe per base model yields strong accuracy--efficiency tradeoffs. On GSM8K, LYNX matches or improves baseline accuracy while reducing tokens by 40--65\%; on MATH-500 it improves accuracy by up to 12 points with roughly 35--60\% fewer tokens; on AIME 2024 it recovers baseline accuracy with more than 50\% token savings; and on CommonsenseQA, a non-math benchmark, it transfers zero-shot with modest accuracy gains and up to 70\% fewer tokens. Compared to state-of-the-art early-exit methods, LYNX offers competitive or superior Pareto frontiers while remaining fully online, requiring no proxy models at inference, and providing explicit, user-tunable confidence guarantees.

AI.tldr: LYNX是一种在线提前退出机制，它利用大型推理模型自身的隐藏状态感知能力，通过在推理提示词（如“嗯”、“等等”）处训练轻量级探针，并结合分裂共形预测，实现置信度控制的早期停止。该机制可显著减少推理时间计算量并提高准确性，且探针可跨任务通用。
AI.motivation: 大型推理模型在复杂任务中常“过度思考”，生成过长的思维链，浪费计算资源并可能损害准确性。现有提前退出方法存在局限性，如依赖额外采样、启发式、辅助验证模型或仅作为事后分析，缺乏形式保证。
AI.method: LYNX将退出决策与生成过程中自然出现的推理提示词（如“嗯”、“等等”）绑定。它在这些提示词的隐藏状态上训练一个轻量级探针，并利用强制退出作为监督信号。探针的得分通过分裂共形预测进行封装，以实现对过早退出的无分布控制。关键在于，探针仅在一个通用数学语料库上训练和校准一次，即可在不同基准、解码温度乃至非数学任务中重复使用。
AI.result: LYNX在1.5B到32B参数范围内的三种模型家族中，通过单个数学训练的探针实现了强大的准确性-效率权衡。在GSM8K上，它匹配或提高了基线准确性，同时减少了40-65%的token；在MATH-500上，准确性提高了多达12个百分点，token减少了约35-60%；在AIME 2024上，恢复了基线准确性，token节省超过50%；在非数学基准CommonsenseQA上，零样本迁移取得了适度的准确性提升和高达70%的token减少。与现有最先进的提前退出方法相比，LYNX提供了有竞争力的或更优的帕累托前沿，同时保持完全在线、无需代理模型且提供明确、用户可调的置信度保证。
AI.conclusion: LYNX是一种高效、鲁棒的在线提前退出机制，它利用模型自身的隐藏状态感知能力，显著提升了大型推理模型的推理效率和准确性。其探针的通用性和跨任务泛化能力，使其成为一种有前景的解决方案，可有效解决模型“过度思考”问题，且无需额外模型或复杂配置。

title: Spatiotemporal Satellite Image Downscaling with Transfer Encoders and Autoregressive Generative Models
summary: We present a transfer-learning generative downscaling framework to reconstruct fine resolution satellite images from coarse scale inputs. Our approach combines a lightweight U-Net transfer encoder with a diffusion-based generative model. The simpler U-Net is first pretrained on a long time series of coarse resolution data to learn spatiotemporal representations; its encoder is then frozen and transferred to a larger downscaling model as physically meaningful latent features. Our application uses NASA's MERRA-2 reanalysis as the low resolution source domain (50 km) and the GEOS-5 Nature Run (G5NR) as the high resolution target (7 km). Our study area included a large area in Asia, which was made computationally tractable by splitting into two subregions and four seasons. We conducted domain similarity analysis using Wasserstein distances confirmed minimal distributional shift between MERRA-2 and G5NR, validating the safety of parameter frozen transfer. Across seasonal regional splits, our model achieved excellent performance (R2 = 0.65 to 0.94), outperforming comparison models including deterministic U-Nets, variational autoencoders, and prior transfer learning baselines. Out of data evaluations using semivariograms, ACF/PACF, and lag-based RMSE/R2 demonstrated that the predicted downscaled images preserved physically consistent spatial variability and temporal autocorrelation, enabling stable autoregressive reconstruction beyond the G5NR record. These results show that transfer enhanced diffusion models provide a robust and physically coherent solution for downscaling a long time series of coarse resolution images with limited training periods. This advancement has significant implications for improving environmental exposure assessment and long term environmental monitoring.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种结合U-Net迁移编码器和扩散模型的生成式降尺度框架，用于从粗尺度输入重建精细分辨率卫星图像。该方法通过在长时间序列粗分辨率数据上预训练U-Net，然后将其编码器冻结并迁移到降尺度模型中，实现了卓越的性能，并保持了物理一致性，优于现有基线模型。
AI.motivation: 研究旨在从粗尺度输入重建精细分辨率卫星图像，以改进环境暴露评估和长期环境监测。面临的挑战是如何在有限的训练周期内，为长时间序列的粗分辨率图像降尺度提供一个稳健且物理上连贯的解决方案。
AI.method: 该方法采用一个迁移学习生成式降尺度框架，结合了轻量级U-Net迁移编码器和基于扩散的生成模型。U-Net首先在NASA MERRA-2（50公里）等粗分辨率数据的长时间序列上进行预训练，以学习时空表示。随后，其编码器被冻结并作为具有物理意义的潜在特征迁移到一个更大的降尺度模型中，目标是重建GEOS-5 Nature Run (G5NR)（7公里）的精细分辨率图像。研究区域为亚洲，并被划分为子区域和季节以提高计算效率。通过Wasserstein距离进行域相似性分析，确认了MERRA-2和G5NR之间的最小分布偏移，验证了参数冻结迁移的安全性。模型性能通过R2、半变异函数、ACF/PACF以及基于滞后的RMSE/R2进行评估，并与确定性U-Net、变分自编码器和先前的迁移学习基线模型进行了比较。
AI.result: 该模型在跨季节区域划分中取得了出色的性能（R2 = 0.65至0.94），并优于包括确定性U-Net、变分自编码器和先前迁移学习基线在内的对比模型。通过数据外评估，发现预测的降尺度图像保留了物理上一致的空间变异性和时间自相关性，从而实现了G5NR记录之外的稳定自回归重建。
AI.conclusion: 研究结果表明，迁移增强的扩散模型为在有限训练周期内对长时间序列粗分辨率图像进行降尺度提供了一个稳健且物理上连贯的解决方案。这一进展对于改善环境暴露评估和长期环境监测具有重要意义。

title: A Hyperspectral Imaging Guided Robotic Grasping System
comment: 8 pages, 7 figures, Accepted to IEEE Robotics and Automation Letters (RA-L) 2025
summary: Hyperspectral imaging is an advanced technique for precisely identifying and analyzing materials or objects. However, its integration with robotic grasping systems has so far been explored due to the deployment complexities and prohibitive costs. Within this paper, we introduce a novel hyperspectral imaging-guided robotic grasping system. The system consists of PRISM (Polyhedral Reflective Imaging Scanning Mechanism) and the SpectralGrasp framework. PRISM is designed to enable high-precision, distortion-free hyperspectral imaging while simplifying system integration and costs. SpectralGrasp generates robotic grasping strategies by effectively leveraging both the spatial and spectral information from hyperspectral images. The proposed system demonstrates substantial improvements in both textile recognition compared to human performance and sorting success rate compared to RGB-based methods. Additionally, a series of comparative experiments further validates the effectiveness of our system. The study highlights the potential benefits of integrating hyperspectral imaging with robotic grasping systems, showcasing enhanced recognition and grasping capabilities in complex and dynamic environments. The project is available at: https://zainzh.github.io/PRISM.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种新型高光谱成像引导的机器人抓取系统，通过PRISM和SpectralGrasp框架，显著提高了纺织品识别和分拣成功率。
AI.motivation: 高光谱成像与机器人抓取系统的集成因部署复杂性和高成本而探索不足，存在简化系统集成和降低成本的需求。
AI.method: 该系统包含PRISM（多面反射成像扫描机制），用于实现高精度、无畸变的高光谱成像，并简化系统集成和降低成本。同时，引入SpectralGrasp框架，利用高光谱图像的空间和光谱信息生成机器人抓取策略。
AI.result: 与人类表现相比，纺织品识别能力显著提高；与基于RGB的方法相比，分拣成功率显著提高。一系列对比实验进一步验证了该系统的有效性。
AI.conclusion: 该研究强调了将高光谱成像与机器人抓取系统相结合的潜在益处，展示了在复杂动态环境中增强的识别和抓取能力。

title: Supervisory Measurement-Guided Noise Covariance Estimation: Discussing Forward and Reverse Differentiation
summary: Reliable state estimation depends on accurately modeled noise covariances, which are difficult to determine in practice. This paper formulates the noise covariance estimation as a bilevel optimization problem that factorizes the joint likelihood of primary and supervisory measurements to reconcile information exploitation with computational tractability. The factorization converts the nested Bayesian dependency into a Markov-chain structure, allowing efficient computation. At the lower level, a Kalman filter with state augmentation performs such computation. Meanwhile, closed-form forward and reverse differentiation provide efficient gradients for the upper-level updates, and we compare the two models' space and time complexities to inform their practical selection. The upper level subsequently refines the noise covariances to guide the lower-level estimation. Taken together, the proposed algorithms offer a systematic and computationally efficient approach to noise covariance estimation in linear Gaussian systems.

AI.tldr: 本文提出一种双层优化方法，通过分解联合似然将噪声协方差估计问题转化为马尔可夫链结构，利用卡尔曼滤波和高效梯度更新，实现线性高斯系统中噪声协方差的系统化和计算高效估计。
AI.motivation: 可靠的状态估计依赖于准确建模的噪声协方差，但在实际中这些协方差很难确定。
AI.method: 将噪声协方差估计公式化为双层优化问题。通过分解初级和监督测量的联合似然，将嵌套的贝叶斯依赖转化为马尔可夫链结构以提高计算效率。下层使用带状态增强的卡尔曼滤波器进行计算，而上层则通过闭式前向和反向微分提供高效梯度来更新噪声协方差。同时，比较了两种模型的空间和时间复杂度。
AI.result: 所提出的算法为线性高斯系统中的噪声协方差估计提供了一种系统化且计算高效的方法。
AI.conclusion: 该研究提供了一种系统化且计算高效的算法，用于解决线性高斯系统中难以确定的噪声协方差估计问题，从而支持更可靠的状态估计。

title: Self-Improving VLM Judges Without Human Annotations
summary: Effective judges of Vision-Language Models (VLMs) are crucial for model development. Current methods for training VLM judges mainly rely on large-scale human preference annotations. However, such an approach is costly, and the annotations easily become obsolete as models rapidly improve. In this work, we present a framework to self-train a VLM judge model without any human preference annotations, using only self-synthesized data. Our method is iterative and has three stages: (1) generate diverse multimodal instruction-response pairs at varying quality levels, (2) generate reasoning traces and judgments for each pair, removing the ones that do not match our expected quality levels, and (3) training on correct judge answers and their reasoning traces. We evaluate the resulting judge on Multimodal RewardBench and VL-RewardBench across domains: correctness, preference, reasoning, safety, and visual question-answering. Our method improves a Llama-3.2-11B multimodal judge from 0.38 to 0.51 in overall accuracy on VL-RewardBench, often outperforming much larger models including Llama-3.2-90B, GPT-4o, and Claude 3.5 Sonnet, with particularly strong gains in general, hallucination, and reasoning dimensions. The overall strength of these human-annotation-free results suggest the potential for a future self-judge that evolves alongside rapidly improving VLM capabilities.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种无需人工偏好标注的视觉语言模型（VLM）自训练评估器框架。该方法通过迭代自合成数据，显著提升了评估器的准确性，甚至超越了更大的模型。
AI.motivation: 当前训练VLM评估器的方法严重依赖大规模人工偏好标注，这不仅成本高昂，而且随着模型快速发展，标注数据很容易过时。因此，需要一种更高效、更具适应性的评估器训练方法。
AI.method: 该方法是迭代的，包含三个阶段：1) 生成不同质量水平的多模态指令-响应对；2) 为每个对生成推理痕迹和判断，并移除不符合预期质量水平的对；3) 基于正确的评估答案及其推理痕迹进行训练。
AI.result: 在Multimodal RewardBench和VL-RewardBench上的评估显示，该方法将一个Llama-3.2-11B多模态评估器在VL-RewardBench上的整体准确率从0.38提高到0.51，在通用性、幻觉和推理维度上表现尤为突出，并且常常优于Llama-3.2-90B、GPT-4o和Claude 3.5 Sonnet等更大的模型。
AI.conclusion: 这些无需人工标注的结果表明，未来有望实现一个能够与VLM能力快速提升同步进化的“自评估器”，从而解决当前评估器训练的成本和时效性问题。

title: FlowEO: Generative Unsupervised Domain Adaptation for Earth Observation
comment: 2026 IEEE/CVF Winter Conference on Applications of Computer Vision (WACV), Mar 2026, Tucson (AZ), United States
summary: The increasing availability of Earth observation data offers unprecedented opportunities for large-scale environmental monitoring and analysis. However, these datasets are inherently heterogeneous, stemming from diverse sensors, geographical regions, acquisition times, and atmospheric conditions. Distribution shifts between training and deployment domains severely limit the generalization of pretrained remote sensing models, making unsupervised domain adaptation (UDA) crucial for real-world applications. We introduce FlowEO, a novel framework that leverages generative models for image-space UDA in Earth observation. We leverage flow matching to learn a semantically preserving mapping that transports from the source to the target image distribution. This allows us to tackle challenging domain adaptation configurations for classification and semantic segmentation of Earth observation images. We conduct extensive experiments across four datasets covering adaptation scenarios such as SAR to optical translation and temporal and semantic shifts caused by natural disasters. Experimental results demonstrate that FlowEO outperforms existing image translation approaches for domain adaptation while achieving on-par or better perceptual image quality, highlighting the potential of flow-matching-based UDA for remote sensing.

AI.tldr: FlowEO是一个利用流匹配（flow matching）的生成模型框架，旨在通过学习语义保留映射，解决地球观测数据中图像空间无监督域适应（UDA）的挑战，从而提高遥感模型的泛化能力。
AI.motivation: 地球观测数据日益丰富，但其固有的异质性（来自不同传感器、区域、时间、大气条件）导致训练和部署域之间的分布偏移，严重限制了预训练遥感模型的泛化能力。因此，无监督域适应（UDA）对于实际应用至关重要。
AI.method: 本文提出了FlowEO框架，利用生成模型进行地球观测图像空间UDA。具体来说，它利用流匹配技术学习一个语义保留映射，将源图像分布转换到目标图像分布。这种方法能够处理分类和语义分割等具有挑战性的域适应配置。
AI.result: FlowEO在域适应方面优于现有的图像转换方法，同时达到了同等或更好的感知图像质量。实验在四个数据集上进行，涵盖了SAR到光学转换、以及自然灾害引起的时序和语义偏移等适应场景。
AI.conclusion: 实验结果突出了基于流匹配的UDA在遥感领域具有巨大潜力，能够有效解决地球观测数据的域适应问题。

title: Inverse Linear-Quadratic Gaussian Differential Games
summary: This paper presents a method for solving the Inverse Stochastic Differential Game (ISDG) problem in finite-horizon linear-quadratic Gaussian (LQG) differential games. The objective is to recover cost function parameters of all players, as well as noise scaling parameters of the stochastic system, consistent with observed trajectories. The proposed framework combines (i) estimation of the feedback strategies, (ii) identification of the cost function parameters via a novel reformulation of the coupled Riccati differential equations, and (iii) maximum likelihood estimation of the noise scaling parameters. Simulation results demonstrate that the approach recovers parameters, yielding trajectories that closely match the observed trajectories.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种解决有限时域线性二次高斯（LQG）微分博弈中逆随机微分博弈（ISDG）问题的方法，旨在从观测轨迹中恢复所有参与者的成本函数参数和系统噪声尺度参数。
AI.motivation: 研究动机在于从实际观测到的轨迹中，反向推断出随机微分博弈中各参与者的成本函数参数以及系统所固有的噪声特性。
AI.method: 所提出的框架结合了三方面：(i) 估计反馈策略；(ii) 通过对耦合Riccati微分方程的新颖重构来识别成本函数参数；(iii) 对噪声尺度参数进行最大似然估计。
AI.result: 仿真结果表明，该方法能够成功恢复参数，并生成与观测轨迹高度匹配的轨迹。
AI.conclusion: 该方法有效解决了LQG微分博弈中的ISDG问题，能够从观测数据中准确恢复参与者成本和系统噪声参数。

title: Spatiotemporal Tubes for Differential Drive Robots with Model Uncertainty
summary: This paper presents a Spatiotemporal Tube (STT)-based control framework for differential-drive mobile robots with dynamic uncertainties and external disturbances, guaranteeing the satisfaction of Temporal Reach-Avoid-Stay (T-RAS) specifications.
